title: My first book of Islamic Months: A fold-out, lift-the-flap book
description: Count your way through the Islamic months with this beautifully illustrated fold-out, lift-the-flap book. Teach your child the names of the months in Arabic and English. Discover special facts as you lift each flap! Fold out the pages of the book to create a colourful display suitable for homes, classrooms and libraries.
author: Hajera Memon
